comments.comment: Excellent fix - properly accessing lockoutStatus.isLocked property and using userMessage
Good fix - getAccountLockoutStatus now correctly returns boolean value
Excellent - requestAccountUnlock now properly routes to sendUnlockEmail method
API now correctly receives boolean value from getAccountLockoutStatus
All critical integration issues have been resolved. The implementation is now production-ready
Consider adding metrics tracking for lockout events to monitor security patterns
comments.suggested_fix: Add logging/metrics for: failed login attempts per user, lockout frequency, unlock method usage
